> Since hcc is not compatible with 2.0, is clustering a feature of  
> this new version?  If so, please, explain or provide documentation  
> on how to implement.  If not, when or is it going to be an added  
> feature?
>
Some features of hcc are already available in Heritrix 2.0; it can  
remotely create, configure, launch and monitor crawls via JMX. We are  
working with an outside partner to fully document the 2.0 JMX  
interface; that documentation project should be done by the end of  
January.

But the Heritrix 2.0 engine does not keep an internal list of  
available crawlers, and so cannot automatically select a non-busy  
crawler to launch a new job in. I believe this is the only hcc  
feature missing from the engine, though I haven't done a thorough  
analysis.

We do plan to support hcc or hcc-like features in 2.0, but wanted to  
release the crawler/webui first. We have no timeframe for hcc  
features yet, as we are trying to prioritize other 2.0-related work  
too (documentation, testing, 1.x conversion tools, and so on). We'll  
let you know as soon as we have it all figured out.

-Paul
